item.title: mask-rcnn install
item.description: Installation Requirements: PyTorch 1.0 from a nightly release. It will not work with 1.0 nor 1.0.1. Installation instructions can be found in https://pytorch.org/get-started/locally/ torchvision from master cocoapi yacs matplotlib GCC >= 4.9 OpenCV Option 1: Step-by-step installation # first, make sure that your conda is setup properly with the right environment # for that, check that `which conda`, `which pip` and `which python` points to the # right path.
